message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the money with me taking 60% and you taking 40%. This seems fair considering the effort and time we've put into this game. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I believe a 50/50 split is a fair way to go. This way, we both walk away with an equal share of the prize. I hope you agree with this equitable proposal!

Hi Bob, I understand your desire for fairness, but considering the inflation impact on my share, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This way, we both still get a significant amount, and it accounts for the diminishing value of the money for me. What do you think?
